Posts.EditableText:
I played my recent published game as I was wondering if the save thing was there, and I could find a save button nor I don't think there is a command.
I don't know how to do that stuff, if you guys can please help me do save game, and load game
Thanks
Posts.HTML:
I played my recent published game as I was wondering if the save thing was there, and I could find a save button nor I don't think there is a command.
I don't know how to do that stuff, if you guys can please help me do save game, and load game
Thanks

Posts.EditableText:
Go to edit/view listing, or click on your username or avatar.

Save should be in the upper right hand corner. If you don't want to use it, type "save".

To load, click resume on play.

No, I don't think you can do loading on the editor.
